026package org.slf4j.impl;
027
028import org.slf4j.IMarkerFactory;
029import org.slf4j.MarkerFactory;
030import org.slf4j.helpers.BasicMarkerFactory;
031import org.slf4j.spi.MarkerFactoryBinder;
032
033/**
034 * 
035 * The binding of {@link MarkerFactory} class with an actual instance of 
036 * {@link IMarkerFactory} is performed using information returned by this class. 
037 * 
038 * @author Ceki G&uuml;lc&uuml;
039 */
040public final class StaticMarkerBinder implements MarkerFactoryBinder {
041
042    /**
043     * The unique instance of this class.
044     */
045    public static final StaticMarkerBinder SINGLETON = new StaticMarkerBinder();
046
047    /* package */ final IMarkerFactory markerFactory = new BasicMarkerFactory();
048
049    private StaticMarkerBinder() {
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Return the singleton of this class.
054     * 
055     * @return the StaticMarkerBinder singleton
056     * @since 1.7.14
057     */
058    public static StaticMarkerBinder getSingleton() {
059        return SINGLETON;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Currently this method always returns an instance of 
064     * {@link BasicMarkerFactory}.
065     */
066    public IMarkerFactory getMarkerFactory() {
067        return markerFactory;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Currently, this method returns the class name of
072     * {@link BasicMarkerFactory}.
073     */
074    public String getMarkerFactoryClassStr() {
075        return BasicMarkerFactory.class.getName();
076    }
077
078}
